purpleculture_pinyin:
huán
surname Huan; Chinese soapberry (Sapindus mukurossi); big; pillar (old)
фамилия Хуан; Китайская мыльница (Sapindus mukurossi); большой; столб (старый)
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 亘 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
盘桓 [ pán huán ]: to pace; to linger; to stay over; to spiral; to hover
齐桓公 [ qí huán gōng ]: Duke Huan of Qi (reigned 685-643 BC), one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
张荫桓 [ zhāng yìn huán ]: Zhang Yinhuan (1837-1900), late Qing politician and senior Chinese diplomat
罗荣桓 [ luó róng huán ]: Luo Ronghuan (1902-1963), Chinese communist military leader
桓仁 [ huán rén ]: Huanren Manchu autonomous county in Benxi 本溪 , Liaoning

    • 亘 [ gèn ] to extend across, through; from
Ru_trainchinese: huán: (графема) дерево с листвой как у ивы и белым стволом; значительно; эффективно
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " gen " sound. The original meaning is the wooden pillar used as a symbol next to the ancient post pavilion, and later generally refers to the wooden pillar that functions as a symbol in various places. "Said Wen": "Huan, the pavilion and the post table. From the wood, the sound." Xu Kai's biography: "The ancients have a long pavilion for ten miles, and a short pavilion for five miles. Posting, passing, so stop passing visitors. Double table Standing as Huan." Such as "Mozi. Beichengmen": "Times make you look good, and you can enter the Huan shallow and deep." Sun Yirang leisurely explain: "The straight wood next to the two doors of the Huangate." "Han Shu. "Chu Official Biography" "Huan Dong at the Gate of the Temple" means that the (corpse) is buried on the east side of the Huan Zhu outside the official office.

"Huanhuan" means mighty appearance. Such as "Shang Shu. Shepherd Oath": "Master! Shang Huanhuan, like a tiger, like a brace, like a bear, and like a beard, in the suburbs of Shang Dynasty." Kong Chuan: "Huanhuan, martial appearance." And "Poetry. Lu Song. "Pan Shui": "Huan Huan Yu Zheng, Di Bi Southeast."

" Huan " is also the name of the mountain, "Warring States. "Qi Ce Wu": "The former Qi and Yan fought in Huan's song, and the Yan is invincible." Bao Biao's note: "The so-called Huanshan in "Family Language" is built between Qi and Lu." It is also the name of water, "Shui Jing Zhu. "Huanshui": "Huanshui exits Minshan Mountain in Shu County, travels southwest to Qiangzhong, and enters the South China Sea." It is also the name of wood. "Jade articles. "Kibe": "Hwan, Hwanmu, leaves resemble willow, with yellow and white skin."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " gen " sound. The original meaning is the wooden pillar used as a symbol next to the ancient post pavilion, and later generally refers to the wooden pillar that functions as a symbol in various places.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「亘」聲。本義是古代郵亭旁邊用為標誌的木柱，後來泛指立於各處起標誌作用的木柱。《說文》：「桓，亭郵表也。从木，亘聲。」徐鍇繫傳：「古者十里一長亭，五里一短亭。郵，過也，所以止過客也。表雙立為桓。」如《墨子．備城門》：「時令人行貌封，及視關入桓淺深。」孫詒讓閒詁：「桓蓋門兩扉旁之直木。」《漢書．酷吏傳》「瘞寺門桓東」，意謂（屍體）埋葬在官署門外桓柱東面。

　　「桓桓」表示威武貌。如《尚書．牧誓》：「勗哉夫子！尚桓桓，如虎、如貔、如熊、如羆，于商郊。」孔傳：「桓桓，武貌。」又《詩．魯頌．泮水》：「桓桓于征，狄彼東南。」

　　「桓」也是山名，《戰國策．齊策五》：「昔者齊燕戰於桓之曲，燕不勝。」鮑彪注：「《家語》所謂桓山，蓋在齊魯之間。」又是水名，《水經注．桓水》：「桓水出蜀郡岷山，西南行羌中，入于南海。」又是木名。《玉篇．木部》：「桓，桓木，葉似柳，皮黃白色。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「亘」聲。本義是古代郵亭旁邊用為標誌的木柱，後來泛指立於各處起標誌作用的木柱。

桓字的基本解释

桓
huán
古代立在城郭、宫殿、官署、陵墓或驿站路边的木柱：桓表。
大：桓治（大治）。
〔桓桓〕威武的样子，如“桓桓陈将军，仗钺奋忠烈”。
姓。

桓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
亦作“亘3”。
(1)表柱。原指古时邮亭旁作为表识的柱子，后泛指寺、墓、桥、城门等处用作表识或其他用途的柱子。
(2)指门扇内面两边固定门闩的直木。
(3)大。参见“桓撥”。
(4)盘桓。
(5)忧虑。
(6)见“桓桓”。
(7)水名。即今白龙江。发源于甘肃省岷县。
(8)山名。
(9)木名。即无患木。传说此木为众鬼所畏，取为器用，辟恶气，镇邪。
(10)姓。汉代有桓谭。

桓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桓； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页526第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡官切，音丸。【說文】郵亭表也。【徐曰】表雙立爲桓。漢法，亭表四角建大木，貫以方板，名曰桓表，縣所治兩邊各一。【前漢·尹賞傳】葬寺門桓東。　又斲木如石?四植謂之桓，以下棺也。【禮·檀弓】三家視桓楹。　又【周禮·春官】公執桓圭。　又桓桓，武貌。【書·牧誓】尚桓桓。【詩·魯頌】桓桓于征。　又盤桓，難進貌。【易·屯卦】盤桓利居貞。　又水名。【書·禹貢】西傾因桓是來。　又【諡法】辟土服遠，克敬勤民，皆曰桓。　又【方言】桓，憂也。　又木名。【郭璞云】葉似柳，子似楝。【玉篇】皮黃白色。【山海經】袟周之山木多桓。　又【酉陽雜俎】無患木，一名桓。　又盤桓，髻名。【古今註】長安婦人好爲盤桓髻。　又姓。【姓苑】望出譙郡，漢有桓榮。　又叶敕倫切，音櫄。【漢高彪詩】古之君子，卽戎忘身。明其果毅，尚其桓桓。　又叶王權切，音圓。【陶潛·歸去來辭】雲無心以出岫，鳥倦飛而知還。景翳翳以將入，撫孤松以盤桓。還音旋。

桓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桓字的起名意思

：指文采明盛、勇武出众的样子，如郁郁桓桓；也指华表，桓表。

Huan
Basic explanation of words
Huan
huán
Ancient wooden pillars standing on the side of city walls, palaces, government offices, mausoleums or post roads: Huan Biao.
Da: Huanzhi (Dazhi).
[Huanhuan] A mighty appearance, such as "General Huanhuan Chen, loyal to Ye."
name.
Huan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
Also known as "Gen 3".
(1) Table column. Originally it refers to the pillars that were used for identification in the ancient post pavilion. Later, it refers to the pillars used for identification or other purposes in temples, tombs, bridges, and city gates.
(2) Refers to the straight wood that fixes the latch on both sides of the door leaf.
(3) Big. See "Huan dial".
(4) Pan Huan.
(5) Worry.
(6) See "Huanhuan".
(7) Water name. Now Bailongjiang. Originated in Min County, Gansu Province.
(8) The name of the mountain.
(9) Wooden names. That is, no trouble wood. Legend has it that this wood is feared by many ghosts and used as a tool to ward off evil spirits and suppress evil spirits.
(10) Last name. There was Huan Tan in the Han Dynasty.
Huan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桓; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 526 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Guan cut, sound pill. [Said the text] The post box table is also. [Xu Yue] The table double stands as Huan. In the Han method, big woods were built at the four corners of the pavilion and table, and the square boards were run through. The name was Huan Table, one on each side of the county. [Previous Han·Yin Shang Biography] The gate of the buried temple is Huandong.　Against wood like a stone? Sizhi is called Huan, and the coffin is also below. [Li·Tan Gong] Sanjia sees Huanying.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan] The public is in charge of Huan Gui.　Yuanhuan, Wu Meng. 【Book · Pastoral Oath】Shang Huanhuan. 【Poetry·Lu Song】Huanhuan Yuzheng.　Holding around again, it's hard to look good. [Yi·Tun Gua] Pan Huan Li Juzhen.　Also known as water. 【Book·Yugong】Western tilt is coming because of Huan.　 [Posthumous Law] To protect the earth and serve the world, to respect the people, and to call it Huan.　[Dialect] Huan, worry too.　Also wooden name. [Guo Puyun] The leaves resemble willows, and the sons resemble neem. 【Jade articles】The skin is yellow and white. 【Shan Hai Jing】The mountain and wood of the Zhou Zhou are multi-huan.　[Youyang Miscellaneous Cu] Wuxianmu, a Huan.　Banhuan again, bun name. [Ancient and Modern Note] The Chang'an woman is a good bun.　Another last name. [Surname Garden] Looking out Qiaojun, there is Huanrong in the Han Dynasty.　 Ye Chi Lun cut again, Yin Xie. [Hen Gao Biao Poem] The ancient gentleman, Yi Rong forgets himself. Ming Qi Guo Yi, Shang Qi Huan.　 Ye Wangquan cut again, the sound is round. [Tao Qian·Returning Words] Yun Wuxin came out of Xiu, and the bird flew away when he was tired. The Jing Yiyi can enter, and the lonely pine can be hung by the solitary pine. Also sound spin. Huan
